stops.title: Beni Mellal
stops.details: Beni Mellal is a city known for its agricultural productivity and the beautiful surrounding landscapes. It's the starting point of your adventure.

images.description: A scenic view of Beni Mellal city.

activities.title: Explore Ain Asserdoun
activities.details: Visit the Ain Asserdoun spring and enjoy the surrounding gardens, perfect for an afternoon family stroll.

stops.title: Cascades d'Ouzoud
stops.details: Experience the breathtaking views of the Ouzoud Waterfalls, one of Morocco's most famous natural attractions, offering great hiking trails.

activities.title: Hiking Adventure
activities.details: Family-friendly hiking trails offering beautiful scenery and opportunities to see local flora and fauna.

activities.title: Boat Ride Near the Falls
activities.details: Enjoy a scenic boat ride that takes you close to the base of the falls.
activities.address: Boat Ride Dock, Cascades d'Ouzoud, Morocco

images.description: A boat ride near the Ouzoud Waterfalls.

stops.title: Ifrane
stops.details: Known as 'Little Switzerland', Ifrane is characterized by its alpine architecture and nearby forested areas.

images.description: Beautiful townscape of Ifrane, resembling a Swiss village.

activities.title: Visit to Michlifen Ski Resort
activities.details: Although not the season for skiing, it's a great spot to enjoy breathtaking views and walk around the resort area.

activities.title: Explore Cedars Forest
activities.details: Stroll through the famous Cedars forests of Ifrane, home to Barbary macaques.
activities.address: Cedars Forest, Ifrane National Park, Morocco

images.description: Tall and ancient cedar trees at Ifrane National Park.

stops.title: Fés
stops.details: Fes is the cultural and spiritual center of Morocco, famous for its historic medina and vibrant souks.

images.description: A historic view of the ancient city of Fes.

activities.title: Explore Fes el Bali Medina
activities.details: Navigate through one of the world's largest urban pedestrian zones filled with history, markets, and culinary delights.

activities.title: Visit the Royal Palace of Fes
activities.details: Marvel at the grandeur of the Royal Palace's gates, which stand as a testament to Moroccan artisanship.

images.description: The impressive facade of the Royal Palace in Fes.
